snippet: Spain limited Croatia to 3 points in the final quarter as it began its bid for a third straight European basketball title with a 68-40 victory in Celje, Slovenia.
abstract: Spain defeats Croatia, 68-40, to begin its bid for a third straight European basketball title; other opening games noted.
lead_paragraph: Spain limited Croatia to 3 points in the final quarter as it began its bid for a third straight European basketball title with a 68-40 victory in Celje, Slovenia.

headline.main: Spain Cruises in European Basketball Opener
headline.print_headline: Spain Defeats Croatia in European Opener
